name: Planet Earth Vs Wild Planet [Local Multiplayer Game (2P)]
name_original: Planet Earth Vs Wild Planet [Local Multiplayer Game (2P)]
description:
->Local Multiplayer <- (Can be played only by two persons)
play in FULLSCREEN to avoid menu clipping issue now. Will fix it later.

Planet Earth Vs Wild Planet is a 2Player local multiplayer game where only player will play as earth and another one will be wild planet. 
(If playing in webgl play in FULLSCREEN, Also zip attached to download)

Planet Earth collect stars to win.

Wild Planet make earth to hit walls win.

Grab up the challenge and play with your friends for fun experience.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music -> From Aries Beat - Night ride

Fx -> Unity Cartoon fx
